version_description:
- Fixed surround generator panels in RTA, FFT, Smaart, TF, for 6.1 signals
- Removed Spectral Balance for release
- Added link to help page for in-app purchase
- Fixed SPL graph minimal mode running LEQ
- Enabled landscape mode for iPhone6plus

- Fixed surround generator panels in RTA, FFT, Smaart, TF, for 6.1 signals
- Removed Spectral Balance for release
- Added link to help page for in-app purchase
- Fixed SPL graph minimal mode running LEQ
- Enabled landscape mode for iPhone6plus

-Added Audio Wave File processing
Now you can import audio wave files created in SPL Graph, or created externally and loaded into the SPL Graph public data folder, into RTA, FFT, Smaart, SPL Pro, and SPL Graph modules for processing. These are processe

-Added Audio Wave File processing
Now you can import audio wave files created in SPL Graph, or created externally and loaded into the SPL Graph public data folder, into RTA, FFT, Smaart, SPL Pro, and SPL Graph modules for processing. These are processe

Surround Generator
-5.1 Surround Signals now work with the Apple HDMI adapter for iOS devices running iOS 9.3 or later

SPL Graph
-Improved handling of hourly repeats
-Fixed Leq50 ms time fields

Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

Surround Generator
-5.1 Surround Signals now work with the Apple HDMI adapter for iOS devices running iOS 9.3 or later

SPL Graph
-Improved handling of hourly repeats
-Fixed Leq50 ms time fields

Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

*Added support for new iTestMic2

-AudioTools, #1 audio test & measurement app! Now updated for iOS 10

*Added support for new iTestMic2
*Added new Gated Noise RT60 module option
- Measure octave band reverb decay times
- Conforms to ISO 3382
*Fixed Room Correction

New! Transmission Loss
-New Module. Fully meets ASTM E336 and E990, and ISO 140-4 and ISO 717-1 standards for rating sound insulation in buildings.
-Test 1/3 octave levels in Sending and Receiving rooms, test Reverb Time, and full results are comp

New! Transmission Loss
-New Module. Fully meets ASTM E336 and E990, and ISO 140-4 and ISO 717-1 standards for rating sound insulation in buildings.
-Test 1/3 octave levels in Sending and Receiving rooms, test Reverb Time, and full results are comp

New Module!
Audio Coverage Uniformity (ACU)
Based on the ANSI/InfoComm 102.01:2017 standard, ACU provides a powerful and easy method for measuring and quantifying the uniformity of SPL levels in a room or venue.

Generator
-It's back!

New Module!
Audio Coverage Uniformity (ACU)
Based on the ANSI/InfoComm 102.01:2017 standard, ACU provides a powerful and easy method for measuring and quantifying the uniformity of SPL levels in a room or venue.

Generator
